explains: adj. 平凡的；不显著的；不值得注意的

sentences.en: An unremarkable shrub on the gravel plain moved and resolved into an ostrich.
sentences.cn: 砾石平原上的一株不起眼的灌木移动了一下，变成了一只鸵鸟。

sentences.en: And, of course, its lavatories were unremarkable.
sentences.cn: 当然，它的厕所也是稀松平常的。

sentences.en: They don't wear much makeup. Their outfits are unremarkable.
sentences.cn: 她们不化浓妆，穿着平凡。
